title: Bug 4964: Automatic Code Assist needs to prioritize matching method over variable name
description:
When using the automatic code assist feature, I encountered an issue. Specifically, when I typed 'button.DISPOSED', the code assist feature selected 'DISPOSED' instead of the method 'dispose()'. This resulted in unwanted code being inserted ('button.DISPOSED') and I had to manually delete it. To prevent this, the code assist feature should prioritize matching method names over variable names.

Additionally, I suggest making the code assist feature case-sensitive when automatically inserting code.
EB: The automatic code assist feature should prioritize matching method names over variable names and should be made case-sensitive when automatically inserting code.
